Text: Please give me feedback about console support. Is the audio/video working alright?
i tried it on PC, Wii, and PS3. the audio / video works great. but the *.srt doesnt work. it doesnt show the subtitle.

I'm sure the movie and shit is gr8, but I've been at like 400 kb/s the whole time. Although I've spent a lot of time at around 200 kb/s. This shit is mad ghey. I did another torrent w/more seeds, but the video ratio reminded me of how poor people watch movies, so I'm getting this.
Works great on my PS3. Thanks!

Thanks so much, quality is perfect! I played this file with VLC and the subs worked fine.
